nodes.text: The Republic Mining Camp was a settlement used by the mining workers employed by the Galactic Republic on the planet Quesh during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. Located west of the Republic Operational Headquarters, the camp came under attack by the forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire under Moff Dracen during the Quesh war.
The Republic Mining Camp appears on Quesh in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
